## About This Site

This is the personal portfolio website of Estivan Ayramia.

## Owner Information

- Name: Estivan Ayramia
- Role: General Business Student at San Diego State University (SDSU)
- Location: El Cajon, CA (San Diego area)
- Email: hello@estivanayramia.com
- LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/estivanayramia/
- Expected Graduation: December 18, 2025
- GPA: 3.8

## Site Purpose

This portfolio showcases Estivan's projects, skills, and professional background.
It is designed to help recruiters, hiring managers, and collaborators learn about his work.

## Projects (6 total)

1. This Website (Every Line)
   - URL: https://www.estivanayramia.com/projects/portfolio
   - Type: Web Development
   - Description: Hand-coded portfolio with no templates or CMS. Features include service worker, AI chatbot, and Lighthouse 90+ scores.

2. L'Oréal Cell BioPrint MAPS Campaign
   - URL: https://www.estivanayramia.com/projects/loreal-maps-campaign
   - Type: Campaign Strategy
   - Description: Class concept campaign deck mapping three personas and their touchpoints across the funnel.

3. Franklin Templeton Class Concept
   - URL: https://www.estivanayramia.com/projects/franklin-templeton-concept
   - Type: Content Strategy
   - Description: 17-page class concept deck for a 'Voice of Progress' campaign.

4. EndPoint LinkedIn Campaign
   - URL: https://www.estivanayramia.com/projects/endpoint-linkedin-campaign
   - Type: Retargeting Strategy
   - Description: 15-page deck outlining Phase 2A and Phase 2B of a LinkedIn retargeting campaign.

5. Endpoint Elosity Launch Video
   - URL: https://www.estivanayramia.com/projects/endpoint-elosity-video
   - Type: Video Concept
   - Description: Motion storyboard and voiceover script for product launch.

6. Taking Down Endpoint (Almac Group + 4G Clinical)
   - URL: https://www.estivanayramia.com/projects/endpoint-competitive-playbook
   - Type: Competitive Strategy
   - Description: Marketing strategy deck for competitive positioning.

## Important Clarifications

- "Whispers" is a HOBBY (capturing thoughts on sticky notes), NOT a project
- "getWispers" is NOT a real project and does not exist
- The "Conflict Resolution Playbook" does NOT exist on this site

## Background

- Born in Baghdad, Iraq (2004)
- Refugee in Syria
- Immigrated to USA in 2008
- Languages: English (primary), Chaldean (spoken), Spanish & Arabic (conversational)

## Chatbot Information

This site features an AI chatbot named "Savonie" that can answer questions about Estivan.
The chatbot is grounded in the actual site content and cannot provide information not present on the site.

## Contact

For inquiries, reach out at hello@estivanayramia.com
Estivan typically responds within 24 hours.

## Site Technical Details

- Hosting: Cloudflare Pages
- Framework: Static HTML with Tailwind CSS
- Chatbot Backend: Cloudflare Workers with Gemini AI
- No CMS or templating - hand-coded
- PWA-enabled with service worker
- Lighthouse scores: 90+
